mapper.select: select ur.id as id, ur.user_id as user_id, u.realname as realname, ur.role_id as role_id, r.name as name from sms_role as r left join (sms_user as u left join sms_user_role as ur on ur.user_id = u.id) on ur.role_id = r.id;
mapper.update: update sms_user_role set user_id=null, role_id=null, where id = #{id}
